onboarding.title1: Hey! Welcome to Ship Mobile Fast
onboarding.desc1:
Save hundreds of hours of boring stuff
and ship your app in just couple of days.
onboarding.desc2: Such as authentication, In App Purchases, Stripe payments, Push Notifications, Languages, Themes and more.
onboarding.desc3: We've made the app highly customizable, so you can easily change the UI, components, and more.
onboarding.desc4: Because we've handled all the boring stuff.
onboarding.title5: So What Are You Waiting For?
onboarding.desc5: Let's start and make your app great again!

auth.description: Ship your mobile app in just days
auth.termsOfService: By registering, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
auth.enterEmailToResetPassword: Enter your email to send a magic link
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.pleaseCheckYourEmail: Please check your email, don't forget to check your spam folder.

inAppPurchases.title:
Try Ship Mobile Fast Pro 
 for {{price}}
inAppPurchases.terms: Features can change at any time. Payment will be charged to your App Store account. Renews at the full price after the introductory offer period. Your subscription will auto- renew at your selected interval until you cancel in App Store settings. Amount of the charge may change with notice. Cancel anytime. By tapping 'App Store', you agree to the ShipMobileFast+ Subscription Terms and the auto-renewal.

ua.title: Unlimited Projects
ua.description: Get unlimited access to all premium features and start building super fastly. You can use it unlimited times.

iap.title: In App Purchases
iap.description: Save couple of days for implementing In App Purchases. You can sell anything in your app. Such as subscriptions, one-time purchases, consumable items, etc.

admob.title: Admob
admob.description: Make money with Google Ads in your app with just one line code.

pf.title: Custom Built +20 Premium Screens
pf.description: Chat (Whatsapp style), Swipe Up (Tiktok style), Mini Blog (Kroko style), AI Chatbot (Claude style), Swipe Cards (Tinder style), Camera App (Snapchat style), Auth Flow, Search with Overlay, Profiles, Settings, Delete Account, etc. All custom built for you.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Push Notifications with Expo Push Notification

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Save couple of days for implementing Authentication.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.description: Save couple of days for implementing Onboarding.

ss.title: Share Socials
ss.description: Save couple of days for implementing Share Socials. Such as Facebook Story or Instagram Story

cc.title: Custom Components
cc.description: All built in components are highly customizable. You can easily change the colors, styles, and more. You can not find this buttons on internet. Because if exists, I wasn't built myself.

help.title: Help
help.description: Below are frequently asked questions and support information.

faqs.question: How do I use the app?
faqs.answer: To use the app, you can start from the main screen...

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' option...

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' option...

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. Your account will be permanently deleted and you will not be able to recover it.
